titleInfo.title: Lux Radio Theatre - #603 'The Jolson Story' - Part 6

mods.abstract: CBS radio program the Lux Radio Theatre, episode #603 'The Jolson Story' (part 6) originally broadcast February 16, 1948. Starring Al Jolson, Evelyn Keyes, William Demarest, and Ludwig Donath, with host William Keighley.
